ID.description:
The user's ID.

A numeric string, for compatibility reasons.

deleted.description: The user's deletion status. Only used on Multisite.

spam.description: The user's spam status. Only used on Multisite.

user_activation_key.description: The user's activation key. Be careful not to expose this in your application.

user_nicename.description: The user's name as used in their author archive URL slug.

user_pass.description: The one-way hash of the user's password.

user_status.description: The user's status. This field does not appear to be used by WordPress core.
